org.cloudbus.cloudsim.network.datacenter

Class EdgeSwitch

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cloudbus.cloudsim.core.SimEntity
      • org.cloudbus.cloudsim.network.datacenter.Switch
        • org.cloudbus.cloudsim.network.datacenter.EdgeSwitch
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cloneable, Identificable, Nameable

    public class EdgeSwitch
extends Switch
    This class represents an Edge Switch in a Datacenter network. It interacts with other switches in order to exchange packets.
    Please refer to following publication for more details:
    • Saurabh Kumar Garg and Rajkumar Buyya, NetworkCloudSim: Modelling Parallel Applications in Cloud Simulations, Proceedings of the 4th IEEE/ACM International Conference on Utility and Cloud Computing (UCC 2011, IEEE CS Press, USA), Melbourne, Australia, December 5-7, 2011.
    Since:
    CloudSim Toolkit 3.0
    Author:
    Saurabh Kumar Garg, Manoel Campos da Silva Filho

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static long DOWNLINK_BW
      Default downlink bandwidth of EdgeSwitch in Megabits/s.
      static int LEVEL
      The level (layer) of the switch in the network topology.
      static int PORTS
      Default number of ports that defines the number of Host that can be connected to the switch.
      static double SWITCHING_DELAY
      Default switching delay in milliseconds.

      • Fields inherited from class org.cloudbus.cloudsim.network.datacenter.Switch

        KILOBYTE

      • Fields inherited from class org.cloudbus.cloudsim.core.SimEntity

        FINISHED, HOLDING, id, RUNNABLE, WAITING

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      EdgeSwitch(String name, NetworkDatacenter dc)
      Instantiates a EdgeSwitch specifying switches that are connected to its downlink and uplink ports, and corresponding bandwidths.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getLevel()
      Gets the level (layer) of the Switch in the network topology, depending if it is a root switch (layer 0), aggregate switch (layer 1) or edge switch (layer 2)
      protected void processPacketDown(SimEvent ev)
      Sends a packet to switches connected through a downlink port.
      protected void processPacketForward(SimEvent ev)
      Sends a packet to hosts connected to the switch
      protected void processPacketUp(SimEvent ev)
      Sends a packet to switches connected through a uplink port.

    • Field Detail

      • LEVEL

        public static final int LEVEL
        The level (layer) of the switch in the network topology.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DOWNLINK_BW

        public static final long DOWNLINK_BW
        Default downlink bandwidth of EdgeSwitch in Megabits/s. It also represents the uplink bandwidth of connected hosts.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • PORTS

        public static final int PORTS
        Default number of ports that defines the number of Host that can be connected to the switch.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • SWITCHING_DELAY

        public static final double SWITCHING_DELAY
        Default switching delay in milliseconds.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Constructor Detail

      • EdgeSwitch

        public EdgeSwitch(String name,
                  NetworkDatacenter dc)
        Instantiates a EdgeSwitch specifying switches that are connected to its downlink and uplink ports, and corresponding bandwidths. In this switch, downlink ports aren't connected to other switch but to hosts.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the switch
        dc - The Datacenter where the switch is connected to
